headline.main: SHIP WORKERS VOTE BAN ON COMMUNISTS; Convention Also Refuses to 'Condone' Fascism, Nazism

lead_paragraph: ATLANTIC CITY, Sept. 25 -- The Industrial Union of Marine and Shipbuilding Workers of America (C.I.O.) struck out today at communism in two separate actions at its seventh national convention at the Hotel President.
abstract: s assailed by R J Thomas
